name: Homey Candy app
body: # Candy Homey productivity boost. ## Trigger cards - Homey started ## Condition cards - Cloud connected - Check when has run (not survives reboot) ## Action cards - Reboot Homey - Restart Microcontroller - Enable/disable all flows in folder ## Setup To setup Candy app, make sure API token is set in [app settings][app-settings-link]. ## Donate If you like the app, buy me a beer!
